direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods adjust the Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio but for different loan types (flexible vs. standard).
Both methods involve loan operations and handle similar parameters like loanCoin and collateralCoin.
Both methods interact with loan and collateral coins, affecting the loan's state.
Both methods handle loan-related operations and may throw similar exceptions related to loan parameters.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require loan and collateral parameters to be initialized before execution.
Parameter validation is required before adjusting the LTV, similar to other loan operations.
Both methods involve LTV adjustments and should verify the results to handle potential exceptions.
